p: The apoptosis-inducing activity of IAV A/Chicken/Hubei/489/2004 (H5N1) was studied in MDCK, Vero and HeLa cells. Infected MDCK cells, but not Vero and HeLa cells, showed caspase-8-dependent apoptosis. Thus, it was suggested that this virus-induced apoptosis in a cell-specific manner [ 300]. Avian H5N1 promotes TNF-related apoptosis-inducing ligand (TRAIL) in human monocyte-derived macrophages (MDMs). Apoptosis was induced by TRAIL-activated caspase-10, resulting in the activation of BID and the intrinsic apoptosis pathway ( Figure 5) [ 301].
